name: By Firelight
description:
A short game I made for a challenge against a friend. 

-- Patch Notes v1.5.1 --

-- Additions --

  • Added a slight animation that changes the background color over 600 seconds. 
  • Added a secret extra obstacle that can occur while the timer is over 100 seconds.
  • Added player animations, including jump and teleport animations.
  • Improved the teleport particle effect.
  • Changed the teleport sound effect to something more sonically appealing.
  • Added a slight lenience period for simultaneously jumping and teleporting. 

-- Bug Fixes –

  • Fixed an exploit to gain infinite height by pausing and pressing jump to stack jumps and boost to ridiculous height.
  • Fixed a glitch where the canTeleport boolean of the teleport controller was being set to true every frame, leading to infinite, very fast teleports.
  • Fixed an issue where the teleport animation overwrote the jump animation if the buttons were pressed simultaneously.
